tspan.tspan: : Make one melee or ranged attack w/weapon.
: Gain 2x speed as extra movement for this turn.
: Movement does not provoke opportunity attack for rest of turn.
: Foes I see have DisAdv on attack rolls; Adv on DEX saving throws until next
: Escape grapple by winning an Athletics of Acrobatics check vs foe's Athletics.
: Give an ally Adv on next ability or attack vs foes w/i 5' of me, if before my next turn.
: Hide from those that can't perceive me. DC = Stealth
: Choose an action I will take in response to a trigger. That then becomes my Reax.
: I mean...yeah, look for something. Probably Perception or Investigation.
: One interaction per turn for free, but a 2nd or special case requires an
Action; ex: drawing weapon/shield, drink potion, get item from backpack, etc
: Normal attack on foe w/i 5'. If weapon has "thrown" property,
it may be done as part of melee.
): Adv on next opportunity attack vs marked target (before next
): If made a melee attack w/light weapon in one hand,
then can make a 2nd attack with light melee in other hand (has to be a different
weapon). Off-hand attack does not add positive modifer to damage roll.
: With a free hand, grapple foe up to 1 size larger, Atheltics vs foe's
: Knock item from foe's grasp; attack roll vs foe's Athletics or
Acrobatics. DisAdv if item two-handed. Foe has Adv if larger, DisAdv if smaller.
: Move foe 5' or knock prone, opposing Athletics check. DisAdv if shoving
: Normal attack up to 1st range number. DisAdv if target w/i melee or
: Can move up to speed each turn, split between actions if desired. Moving
through a non-hostile's space, or a 2x larger/smaller hostile's space is free; otherwise is difficult.
Can switch (e.g. flying to walking) by subtracting the distance already moved from the new speed.
: Moving through difficult terrain costs 2x as much speed.
): Move thru hostile space once by winning opposing Athletics check; Adv
): Move thru hostile space once by winning opposing Acrobatics check; no
ay involve a STR (athletics) check if the climb / swim is difficult.
: Crawl while prone (see conditions). Dropping prone costs no movement speed.
: Can jump (STR ability) in feet straight forward, or (3 + STR
least 10 feet of movement prior else distance is halved as a standing jump.
: Standing up from prone costs half your movement speed for this turn.
Fail any sight checks; DisAdv on attacks; foes have Adv on attacks
Cannot harm charmer. Charmer has Adv on ability checks to interact socially.
: DisAdv on checks/attacks while source of fear within eyesight. Cannot willingly
Speed drops to 0, regardless. Ends if grappler incapacitated or moved out of reach
Cannot be seen normally, but still make noise and tracks. Adv on attacks; foes has
Incapacitated + cannot move or speak. Unaware of surroundings. Fail STR & DEX
save throws. Foes have attack Adv, and crit w/i 5 feet.
Incapacitated + cannot move or speak. Unaware of surroundings. Gain resistance to
all damage. Immune to posion and disease. Fail STR & DEX save throws. No aging. Weight
DisAdv on attack and ability rolls.
Crawl (1/2 speed) or stand (costs 1/2 speed). DisAdv on attacks. Foes have attack Adv w/i
Speed drops to 0. DisAdv on DEX saving throws & attacks. Foes have attack Adv.
Incapacitated + cannot move; barely speak. Fails STR & DEX saving throws. Foes
Incapacitated + cannot move or speak. Unaware of surroundings. Drop
everything. Fails STR & DEX saving throws. Foes have attack Adv, and crit w/i 5 feet.
: Can go w/o food for 3 + CON
Can attempt CON save (DC 15) to consume only 1/2g but if drinking less
that, or fail save, then +1 Exhaustion if rested, +2 Exhaustion if already >0.
: 1d6 bludgeoning per 10' fallen, max 20d. End up prone if any damage taken.
Marching more than 8 hours/day requires a CON save (DC 10, +1/ea
fail, increase Exhaustion by a level.
Takes 30-60 min. Spend hit die to regain HP.
Takes 8 hours, once per day. Regain spells slots and all hit die.

tspan.tspan: : Cannot be targeted directly by attack or spell

tspan.tspan: : Out to range, perceive w/o sight
: Out to range, treat dim light as bright light but in greyscale
: Out to range, perceive everything regardless of (magical)
darkness, invisibility, illusions, shape-changing, or etherealness
